name: Summon Night Craft Sword Monogatari: Hajimari no Ishi
name_original: Summon Night Craft Sword Monogatari: Hajimari no Ishi
description: Summon Night Craft Sword Monogatari: Hajimari no Ishi (サモンナイト クラフトソード物語 はじまりの石, Samon Naito Kurafutosōdo Monogatari Hajimari no Ishi) is an action role-playing game by Flight-Plan for the Game Boy Advance.
